name: MatchParagraphStylePreference
shortdesc: The preferences for a running header/footer &#40;match paragraph style) variable.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the MatchParagraphStylePreference (a TextVariable).

property.name: textBefore
property.shortdesc: The text that precedes the value of the variable. (Limit: 128 characters)

property.name: textAfter
property.shortdesc: The text that follows the value of the variable. (Limit: 128 characters)

property.name: appliedParagraphStyle
property.shortdesc: The paragraph style applied to the text. Can also accept: String.

property.name: searchStrategy
property.shortdesc: The starting point and direction in which the search will be conducted.

property.name: changeCase
property.shortdesc: The case of the matched text.

property.name: deleteEndPunctuation
property.shortdesc: If true, deletes end punctuation from the matched text.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MatchParagraphStylePreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
